page.title: 06Communications
page.content: There is a sub-post office at Acton Green. The present postmistress has held this position for l9 years, before her mother ran the post office for 52 years and she took over from her father. So the post office has been run by one family for about l00 years. There is one postal delivery in the morning, letters usually arrive between 9.0 and l0.0 am. There is a collection at the post office in the morning on weekdays and at 4.0 pm. except for Saturday. There are two other letter boxes in the area so many people are a mile or more from a collection point. The postmen are helpful and will take letters for post and will also collect pensions. There is one telephone kiosk at Acton Green, most houses have telephones. Until recently there were many party lines but more lines have been provided.
